member.name: M:byMarc.Net2.Library.Nullable.NullableLib.IfNull(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns an object instead of a DBNull value.
member.param: The value to test for DBNull.
The object to return, if value is DBNull.

member.name: M:byMarc.Net2.Library.Nullable.NullableLib.IfNull(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns an empty string instead of a NULL value.

member.returns: An empty string, if dbValue is NULL; otherwise the dbValue is returned.
